profile.profession: iOS / Swift Developer, Web Systems Product Director, Snr. Project Manager & Bus. Analyst
profile.general: A very experienced, exceptionally skilled and accomplished software development professional, successfully holding positions as Product Manager / Director, Program Manager, Senior Project Manager and Business Analyst over 15+ years, specializing in sophisticated web and mobile platforms across the Beauty, Finance, and Online Advertising industries. I’m recently also a self taught iOS (Swift) Engineer with a keen interest in ML (Machine Learning), AI (Artificial Intelligence) and AR (Augmented Reality), with an extensive range of self written apps and algorithms completed.
profile.value proposition: After many fruitful and wonderful years leading, managing and mentoring teams across a myriad of high profile, large web & mobile app development projects, from concept through to production, I have made the very challenging transition to iOS Engineer and will therefore be a strong asset to any organization looking to add an exceptional, seasoned software development professional to their iOS team. Whether it be for delivery of new features to a preexisting feature set, or delivery of a new, MVP application.

personal projects.description: The aim of the game is to place and rest each of the 7 marbles in the middle of each of the seven circles of the playing area. The marbles are moved by tilting the device to move the marbles (using CoreMotion framework), and have physics so they respond to gravity and react to collisions like in the real world. Sound is also made when marbles collide with each other and / or the the playing area wall
personal projects.technologies: SpriteKit, GameplayKit, CoreMotion, CMMotionManager, SKSpriteNode, SKShapeNode, SKPhysicsWorld, SKPhysicsBody, CategoryBitMask, ContactTestBitMask, ContactBody, SKPhyscisConatct, SKAction, UIBezierPath, CGRect, enum, SKView, extension (UIView)

personal projects.description: The aim of this app is to find how to make any cocktail. The app connects to a paid tier (patreon) 3rd party cocktail database, and utilizes JSON-API calls to fetch data on demand to populate the respective screens of the app. The also caches data to save on API calls, and saves data (as JSON data) to the app bundle (userDefaults) when a user saves cocktails to their favorites
personal projects.technologies: UIKit, CGAffineTransform, UIActivityIndicator, UICollectionView, UICollectionViewCompositionalLayout, UITableView, GestureRecognizer, SegmentController, .xib, JSON-APIs, JSON Encoder / Decoder, URLComponents, queryItems, appendingPathComponents, @escaping functions, UserDefaults, enum, extension (UIView), UITableViewCell, UIActivityIndicator, UISearchController, UIAlertController

personal projects.description: Random number set generator combination sets using rules derived from statistical analysis / research to influence the sets of numbers generated
My Resume / CV Represented as an iOS App

coursework projects.description: My solutions to over 40 swift coding challenges listed in the book Swift Coding Challenges, by Paul Hudson
coursework projects.technologies: String algorithms, Number algorithms (int, double, float, binary), Files / FileManager algorithms, Linked Lists algorithms

coursework projects.description: This app uses historical Tesla sale data combined with Swift's ML framework to determine the resale value of a Tesla.
coursework projects.technologies: UIKit, CoreML, UIStackView, Python, MLModel, UISegmentController

coursework projects.description: A location aware app. When a user comes in range of an iBeacon, trigger a message.

The aim of this app is develop a Restaurant menu customers can review and select items from, add to an order, and then submit the order. Menu / Category Data is provided in locally (computer) hosted JSON files, and order submission uses POST methods.
coursework projects.technologies: UIKit, UITabBarController, UINavigationController, struct (Data Models), UITableView, JSON-APIs, JSON Encoder / Decoder, URLComponents, queryItems, appendingPathComponents, @escaping functions, UserDefaults, enum, UIAlertController

coursework projects.description: The aim of this app is to allow users to create a To Do List where they can: Add a new to do item, edit existing to do item, delete a to do item, mark to do item as complete, add more details like due date and notes, search to do items by title.
coursework projects.technologies: UIKit, FileManager, UITableViewController, UINavigationController, DateFormatter, Class (Data Model), UISearchController, UITableViewCell

coursework projects.description: The aim of this game is to score as many points as possible before the timer runs out. To score points shoot the bad character (Yosemite Sam). Score bonus points by shooting the Money bag when it appears. Lose points by shooting the good character (Donald Duck). Be sure to reload gun before it is emptied. The gun holds a maximum of 6 shots. Reload at any time.
coursework projects.technologies: SpriteKit, GamePlayKit, GameScene, SKSpriteKitNode, SKAction, SKEmitterNode, UIBezierPath, CGPoint, UIAlertController, UIAlertAction, didSet, switch

coursework projects.description: The aim of this app is to create a simple shopping list, by adding and removing items to a UITableView, ensuring the entries are saved to the app's bundle for later retrieval when the app is closed, then reopened.
The aim of this game is to drag the slider left or right and place it in a position that matches the random number you're given at the start of each round of the game.
coursework projects.technologies: UIKit, UIAlertController, UIWebView, html, UISliderView, Notifications, UIImageView, UIButtonView

coursework projects.description: The objective of this app is to overlay (augment) the real world with information (text) about what's around the user. The app works by using the iPhone camera to display the real world, the CoreLocation framework to figure out where in the world the user is, the wikipedia API to download data of based on the user's location, and the ARKit framework to overlay the additional, virtual data (node objects).
coursework projects.technologies: ARKit, CoreLocation, SceneKit, SKScene, SpriteKit, SKLabelNode, CLLocationManager, CLLocation, simd_float4x4, SCNMatrix4MakeRotation, ARAnchor, JSON-API

professional experience.description: Responsible for leading the engineering team to deliver and launch the company’s iOS (Beta) application.

professional experience.accomplishments: Integrated app with a digital coin wallet for customer’s to store digital currency(ies) of choice, Integrated app with Airstayz booking platform, enabling customer account management and hotel booking capabilities, Designed and implemented the company’s JIRA workflow management process.

professional experience.description: A senior role requiring strong Project leadership of cross-functional teams for the timely delivery of web software development projects. In this position I also managed and mentored direct reports from the PM, BA & QA / Test teams.
